qas.question: What is the official language of France?
Where does the General Council want to promote Catalan?
Who recognized Catalan as a departmental language?
What language does the General Council want to promote?

context: Nowadays, France only recognizes <a0_0>French<a0_0/> as an official language. Nevertheless, on 10 December 2007, the <a2_0>General Council of the Pyrénées-Orientales<a2_0/> officially recognized <a3_0>Catalan<a3_0/> as one of the languages of the department and seeks to further promote it <a1_0>in public life and education<a1_0/>.
